quests.welcomeMsg: The message (at NPC site) when the quest is triggered
quests.objectiveMsg: Plain quest description for Quests overview
quests.completedMsg: Message displayed immediately after the quest is completed (optional)
quests.finishedMsg: Message displayed when returned to the quest issuer (optional)

quests.welcomeMsg:
Hello there,
I will teach you the basics.

Follow my instructions and
you will be fine.
quests.completedMsg:
OK lad,

use 'w' or space to jump
and 'a', 'd' to move!
quests.finishedMsg: Now jump on that big box.

quests.welcomeMsg: Now jump on that big box.
quests.completedMsg:
Excellent,

To run hold shift.
If running you can jump much
higher and longer!

quests.welcomeMsg: Now run to the exit sign on the east!
quests.objectiveMsg: Go to the exit sign on the east.
quests.finishedMsg:
Listen up lad,
You did well...for a n00b.

The time is running out.
Now hurry to the white castle.
The real adventure merely begins!

quests.welcomeMsg:
You shall not pass...unless you
bring me knowledge of Kendo!
quests.finishedMsg:
What? Could it be...
I need so much this knowledge!

You must be the chosen one,
proceed now!

quests.welcomeMsg:
Find Hanshi - the great Kendo master,
he will train you.
His dojo is on the east.


Beware of magic slimes!
quests.objectiveMsg:
Find the Kendo master in his dojo on
 the east.

quests.welcomeMsg:
I expected you, we must hurry!
Your first lesson will be:
Fumikomi-ashi (jump attack).
Jump on the enemy and press 's'.

Lets practice Fumikomi-ashi,
collect 10 ki from magic slimes!
quests.objectiveMsg:
Collect 10 Ki from magic slimes.

Attack with: Jump + 's'
quests.completedMsg:
Quest completed!
Hurry back to the dojo!

quests.welcomeMsg:
I saw little girls performing better.

You show no potential...
but still, lets practice some more.
quests.objectiveMsg:
Collect 25 Ki from magic slimes.

Attack with: Jump + 's'
quests.completedMsg:
Quest completed!
Hurry back to the dojo!
